duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee financial and regulatory reporting, ensuring compliance with GAAP and NCUA regulations.
Review and oversee Accounts Payable process, ensuring accurate recording in general ledger accounts.
Assist with quarterly regulatory reporting in compliance with NCUA rules and regulations.
Complete account reconciliations of a more complex nature.
Assist with annual audits and NCUA examination functions.
Review all investment accounting functions in accordance with ASC 320 (FASB 115).
Perform additional duties as assigned, including providing assistance and acting as backup to other accounting staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent formal certifications in accounting or related field (Fiserv DNA experience preferred)
